article.class: fl-post post-112 page type-page status-publish hentry

div.p: Please find all communications and updates regarding COVID-19, school closures, and ongoing resources at our BPS Communications Portal. Please contact the school directly with any questions. Thank you and we will get through this together.

p.span: We are a free public community school open to all children, serving grades K-8. We work hard every day to prepare our scholars for long-term success in our school, high school, college, and beyond. We have high expectations for everyone, from our students to our staff to our leaders. Our goal is to help our scholars chart their own path.

div.p: We partnered with SchoolDox to create a short film about our three E Prep & Village Prep campuses. Get a look into our schools by meeting faculty and leaders and seeing what it's like to be a part of our community. Look for scenes and staff from our Woodland Hills Campus!
E Prep & Village Prep Woodland Hills serves students in grades K-8, and welcomes students entering at any grade or ability level.
Our middle school scholars perform in the top 1% of all students in Ohio for annual student growth. Learn more about our results and any other questions.
E Prep & Village Prep Woodland Hills is located in at E 93rd & Union, at 9201 Crane Ave. Come for our next Open House to tour the school and meet staff & leaders.
All our classrooms are named after colleges and universities, and our graduates consistently earn spots at top area high schools.

blockquote.a: E Prep & Village Prep Woodland Hills Campus

div.p: Our mission is to provide a high quality, academically rigorous education for the college bound scholar. We empower our scholars to think critically, assume social responsibility, and serve as advocates for themselves and the community. We achieve these goals with in a highly focused, structured and safe environment. We, as a community of educators, families and scholars work relentlessly to ensure that every child is prepared to succeed in a competitive world.

span.a: E Prep & Village Prep Woodland Hills

div.p: Our school is public and open to all families, but we do have limited spaces due to class size and grades served. If you are interested in enrolling your child, please sign up to visit our school or start their application early. Thanks for your interest!

Visiting our school is the best way to see if it is right for you and your child. Tour our school, meet staff and families, and get to know us. We have several tour dates available, and if you can't make them we'll set up a personal tour!

Ready to start your child's application? Great! Get started online today. We use SchoolMint to process all enrollments and paperwork. You can save your account as you go, and always contact us with any questions.

E Prep & Village Prep Woodland Hills is a member of Breakthrough Schools, the #1 rated network of public charter schools in Ohio (CREDO at Stanford University). Breakthrough Schools is a group of mission-driven schools committed to providing Cleveland-area families with distinct educational options. Learn more at BreakthroughSchools.org

p.strong: Explore all of our elementary and middle schools:
